title: E3 2017 - What are you looking forward to seeing?
body:
{{champion:267}} I'm really excited to see what Bethesda puts out this year. Ever since their first show it's been something I am hyphy about all the time.

Also looking to see maybe some Cyberpunk 2077 news, something new from Nintendo....the Scorpio. Oooh, and some Last of Us 2 would be nice. EA's new IP?

How about you GD?

Also who do you think will win? I hope Microsoft :^)

**Here's the press conference schedule btw:**

EA: Saturday, June 10 at 12 PM PT

Microsoft: Sunday, June 11 at 2 PM PT

Bethesda: Sunday, June 11 at 9 PM PT

Devolver Digital: June 11 at 10:00 PM PT

PC Gaming Show: Monday, June 12 at 10 AM PT

Ubisoft: Monday, June 12 at 1 PM PT

Sony: Monday, June 12 at 6 PM PT

Nintendo Spotlight: Tuesday, June 13th at 9 AM PT
